name: Landlord
body:
# Current Stable Build: None
# Current Dev Build: None

### Landlord.
Brought to you by LuzFaltex, this program is designed to make purchasing land/plots in Minecraft easier and more controllable by administrators of servers. With this plugin, you can determine who can purchase land, how much land they can purchase, and much more!

```
Dependencies:

Essentials
WorldEdit
```

### Permission Nodes

```
This will be a list of permission nodes as they are released
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Designer Templates
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### Authors and Contributors
Writer: @Foxtrek_64
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
